meta.description: Minimize the total travel cost for a salesperson visiting each city exactly once and returning to the starting city.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: The set of cities the salesperson must visit.

params.name: travel_cost
params.description: The travel cost between each pair of cities.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if the salesperson travels from city i to city j.

objective.name: min_total_travel_cost
objective.expr: sum(travel_cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total travel cost for the salesperson's tour.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_A
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['A'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'A')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city A exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_B
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['B'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'B')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city B exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_C
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['C'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'C')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city C exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_D
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['D'][j] for j in CITIES if j != 'D')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city D exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_A
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['A'] for i in CITIES if i != 'A')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson enters city A exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_B
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['B'] for i in CITIES if i != 'B')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson enters city B exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_C
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['C'] for i in CITIES if i != 'C')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson enters city C exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_D
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['D'] for i in CITIES if i != 'D')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson enters city D exactly once.
